alert.note: Alert for Angelina; Jasper; Polk; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 8:23PM CST until January 30 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Neches River At Rockland affecting Jasper, Polk, Angelina and Tyler Counties. For the Neches River...including Lake Palestine, Neches, Alto, Diboll, Rockland...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neches River at Rockland. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Water will begin to flood several secondary roadways especially in the Smith`s Ferry community. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 25.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 28.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 27.1 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 27.1 feet on 06/29/1993. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Saturday evening at 830 PM CST.
